name: Spherica (Vainstains)
description:
This is my first(complete) game, and has been in dev for ~4 days. Roll around an obstacle course and reach the checkerblock. Jump into the air over an infinite void, and explode into a bunch of rainbow confetti!(because why not)

Added mac support, and a settings menu. FOV currently does nothing.

Update Alpha 0.1.5(2nd update)
